amendment.description: Amendment prohibits the use of funds to implement Executive Order 13547 (75 Fed. Reg. 43023, relating to the stewardship of oceans, coasts, and the Great Lakes), including the National Ocean Policy developed under such Executive Order.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to implement Executive Order 13547 (75 Fed. Reg. 43023, relating to the stewardship of oceans, coasts, and the Great Lakes), including the National Ocean Policy developed under such Executive Order.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Flores amendment (A078) Agreed to by recorded vote: 236 - 190 (Roll no. 291).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Flores amendment (A078) Agreed to by recorded vote: 236 - 190 (Roll no. 291).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A078) offered by Mr. Flores.
